section.audio_text: When BRM is active, a “MOTORING” indication will be shown on the N2 engine display when N2 reaches 18%. This indication will remain until BRM is no longer active. After the MOTORING indication blanks, N1 rotation is seen, and N2 is at 25% or (if 25% is not possible), at maximum motoring and a minimum of 20% N2, the engine start lever is moved to the idle detent.
